languages.text: {n}Октавиана находит самую чистую стопку, протирает пару раз для верности и наполняет болезненно-желтоватой жидкостью из бутыли. Напиток беспощадно жжет внутренности и оставляет деликатное послевкусие плесени, но вкус его удивительно гармонирует с царящей в баре атмосферой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Октавиана находит самую чистую стопку, протирает пару раз для верности и наполняет болезненно-желтоватой жидкостью из бутыли. Напиток беспощадно жжет внутренности и оставляет деликатное послевкусие плесени, но вкус его удивительно гармонирует с царящей в баре атмосферой.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana finds the cleanest shot glass, rubs it a few extra times to be sure, and fills it with sickly yellowish liquid from the bottle. The drink burns your entrails mercilessly and leaves a subtle aftertaste of mould, but its taste meshes amazingly well with the atmosphere in the bar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Октавиана находит самую чистую стопку, протирает пару раз для верности и наполняет болезненно-желтоватой жидкостью из бутыли. languages.text: {n}奥克塔薇娜找了个最干净的酒杯，多擦了几遍确保安全，之后从瓶子里倒满了淡黄色的液体。这杯烈酒无情地灼烧着你的内脏，还留下一股微妙的霉味，但它的味道与酒吧的气氛十分契合。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana finds the cleanest shot glass, rubs it a few extra times to be sure, and fills it with sickly yellowish liquid from the bottle. The drink burns your entrails mercilessly and leaves a subtle aftertaste of mould, but its taste meshes amazingly well with the atmosphere in the bar.{/n}

traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}オクタヴィアナは一番綺麗なショットグラスを手に取り、念の為何度か拭き取ると、ボトルからベトベトとした黄色い液体を注いだ。この酒は内臓をヒリヒリとさせ、カビのような妙な後味を残すが、不思議とバーの雰囲気にピッタリな味をしていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana finds the cleanest shot glass, rubs it a few extra times to be sure, and fills it with sickly yellowish liquid from the bottle. The drink burns your entrails mercilessly and leaves a subtle aftertaste of mould, but its taste meshes amazingly well with the atmosphere in the bar.{/n}

traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana busca el vaso de chupito más limpio, lo frota un par de veces más para asegurarse y lo llena con el líquido amarillento de la botella. La bebida te quema las entrañas sin piedad y te deja un sutil regusto a moho, pero su sabor encaja increíblemente bien con el ambiente del bar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana finds the cleanest shot glass, rubs it a few extra times to be sure, and fills it with sickly yellowish liquid from the bottle. The drink burns your entrails mercilessly and leaves a subtle aftertaste of mould, but its taste meshes amazingly well with the atmosphere in the bar.{/n}

La bebida te quema las entrañas sin piedad y te deja un sutil regusto a moho, pero su sabor encaja increíblemente bien con el ambiente del bar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Octaviana sucht das sauberste Shotglas heraus, poliert es zur Sicherheit noch einmal kurz, und füllt es mit einer unschön gelblichen Flüssigkeit aus der Flasche. Der Schnaps verbrennt dir gnadenlos die Eingeweide und hat einen Nachgeschmack, der an Schimmel erinnert ... aber der Geschmack passt erstaunlich gut zur Atmosphäre der Bar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana finds the cleanest shot glass, rubs it a few extra times to be sure, and fills it with sickly yellowish liquid from the bottle. The drink burns your entrails mercilessly and leaves a subtle aftertaste of mould, but its taste meshes amazingly well with the atmosphere in the bar.{/n}

Der Schnaps verbrennt dir gnadenlos die Eingeweide und hat einen Nachgeschmack, der an Schimmel erinnert ... aber der Geschmack passt erstaunlich gut zur Atmosphäre der Bar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Octaviana prend le verre le plus propre, l'essuie encore une fois par précaution, puis le remplit du liquide jaunâtre de la bouteille. La boisson vous brûle les entrailles et vous laisse un arrière-goût subtil de moisi, mais sa saveur s'accorde étonnamment bien avec l'atmosphère du bar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana finds the cleanest shot glass, rubs it a few extra times to be sure, and fills it with sickly yellowish liquid from the bottle. The drink burns your entrails mercilessly and leaves a subtle aftertaste of mould, but its taste meshes amazingly well with the atmosphere in the bar.{/n}

La boisson vous brûle les entrailles et vous laisse un arrière-goût subtil de moisi, mais sa saveur s'accorde étonnamment bien avec l'atmosphère du bar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Octaviana; bulabildiği en temiz bardağı çıkarıp ne olur ne olmaz diye biraz daha ovalıyor, sonra da içine elindeki şişeden iğrenç sarılıkta bir sıvı döküyor. İçki, bağırsaklarına kadar değdiği her yeri yakıyor ve ağzında hafif bir küf tadı bırakıyor. Ancak barın havası, içkinin tadıyla harika gidiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana finds the cleanest shot glass, rubs it a few extra times to be sure, and fills it with sickly yellowish liquid from the bottle. The drink burns your entrails mercilessly and leaves a subtle aftertaste of mould, but its taste meshes amazingly well with the atmosphere in the bar.{/n}

İçki, bağırsaklarına kadar değdiği yer yeri yakıyor ve aüzında hafif bir küf tadı bırakıyor. Ama barın havası, içkinin tadıyla harika gidiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04
